resources.string: To reduce the chances of spreading the deadly corona virus:
We will remind you to wash your hands:
We will remind you not to touch your face:
We will remind you to clean your house:
Currently you don\'t have any reminder
LIST SOMETHING YOU WANT TO SHARE
LIST SOMETHING YOU WANT TO REQUEST
If you think you have coronavirus (COVID-19) symptoms or have been in close contact with someone who has it, use this self-assessment to help determine how to seek further care.

Are you experiencing any of the following symptoms? \n
severe difficulty breathing (struggling for each breath, speaking in single words) \n
severe chest pain\n
having a very hard time waking up\n
feeling confused \n
lost consciousness

Are you experiencing any of the following symptoms (or a combination of these symptoms)?\n
fever\n
new cough\n
difficulty breathing (for example, struggling for each breath, cannot hold breath for more than 10 seconds)
Have you travelled outside of Canada in the last 14 days?
Has someone you are in close contact with tested positive for COVID-19?

Are you in close contact with a person who either: 

is sick with new respiratory symptoms? 
 or 

recently travelled outside of Canada? 
 Respiratory symptoms can include fever, cough or difficulty breathing.
Contact a doctor or Tele-health Ontario. You may be eligible for a COVID-19 test.\n
More information about your nearest Test center:

Stay at home as much as possible. 
 You do not need to contact a doctor or Telehealth Ontario for an assessment. 
 
 In case of your symptoms began, you must stay at home for 14 days after. 
 In that case : 

Stay at home for 14 days

Tell people you’ve been in contact with

Monitor your health
Please call 911 or go directly to your nearest emergency department.
